name: Sakuro: The Phantom Menance
description:
Magical Girl of Love and Peace Sakura protects the city today too like always. But this time, a new enemy approaches and teams up with her enemy. To defeat them, Sakura team up with Kuro from the Phantom Dimension to defeat the Phantom Menace and save both dimensions from Evil Glamora.

Sakura can transform into 3 Form depends on her need!

Controls 
AD - Move (Horizontal)
W - Jump
Space - Dash
Left Click - Attack 
Right Click (Phantom Form) - Throw kunai
123 - Transform
Esc - Pause/Exit from some menu

Known Bugs

  1. Stage 1-1 Cant transform to Phantom form after 2nd dialogue, solution : transform to other form first then to phantom form.
  2. Sometimes can't transform, 1st solution : left click, press another transform, 2nd solution : restart the level
  3. Cant move after transforming to Melee/Phantom, solution : Left Click, but sometimes it makes the game break.
  4. Falling of the map on stage 1 and nothing happen except health reduced, solution : Esc -> Restart Level.
  5. Pause(Esc) didn't pause the game? Press Esc again.

    TRANSFORM BUGS (1&2) are FIXED in "Reverse Patch" edition

    All assets used in this Project are listed in credits

Gameplay video : Dev Playthrough
